| neurotransmitter dysfunction |
| status epilepticus |

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both cell elements may suffer in common from metabolic disturbance and neurotransmitter dysfunction as occur during massive status epilepticus .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| neurotransmitters |

In this paragraph, the only clear chemical entity mentioned is "neurotransmitters". The paragraph mentions "metabolic disturbance," but it does not specify which metabolites are disturbed, so it is not a valid chemical entity to include in the table. Similarly, "cell elements" and "massive status epilepticus" do not refer to specific chemicals.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| neurotransmitters |

In this revised version, I have removed "cell elements" and "metabolic disturbance" as they do not clearly refer to specific chemicals. The only clear chemical entity mentioned is "neurotransmitters."
